posts.post_title: SOLD: 1882 H804-11, "Short Stop", Peck & Snyder adv
posts.post_content:
1882 H804-11 Circled Position Series Trade Card. 
Produced in 1882 by Cosack & Co., "Short Stop", Peck & Snyder advertisement.

SOLD. PayPal F/F.  PM if interested.
